title: I swear to go i get this unspecified error again im going to quit this game
body: I am trying to reinstall the game and it refuses to patch and no matter all the trouble shooting i do or any the fixes i try it doesn't work. I have tried all the other solutions that were posted and they don't work. So if somebody has any other way of fixing this issue i would be extremely greatful

replies.body: What troubleshooting have you already done?

Sounds like your OS might be blocking the patcher from doing its thing. Essentially, if your OS doesn't have the right permissions in place it might think that a program could be harmful and outright block it. 

Let's go through our [**Permission Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure that we've got all those settings in place. Hit us back up if you've got any other questions!
